articles.title: Pope Francis names 20 new cardinals, most of whom will likely vote for his successor | DW | 27.08.2022 - DW (English)
articles.description: Pope Francis has inducted 20 cardinals from around the world, 16 of whom are young enough to have a say in any potential vote for the next pope. The selections hailed from Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas.
articles.content:
Pope Francis appointed 20 new Roman Catholic Cardinals at a ceremony in St Peter's Basilica on Saturday.
